caption.p: Fundamental aspects of CCR5 (panel A) and frequency of the Δ32 allele in selected countries (panel B). This figure was created using Servier Medical Art illustrations (available at https://smart.servier.com, under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported License). The bar chart was plotted using GraphPad Prism 5.01 software (GraphPad Software, Inc., San Diego, CA, USA). The Δ32 allele frequencies were obtained from Solloch et al. (2017).
